en.guide0: Make sure to setup a bot account (to pay for txn fees) with /newaccount, and set the chat invite url with /setinviteurl [url] e.g. /setinviteurl https://t.me/mygroupname.

es.guide0: Make sure to setup a bot account (to pay for txn fees) with /newaccount, and set the chat invite url with /setinviteurl [url] e.g. /setinviteurl https://t.me/mygroupname.
